content.webTitle: Compass to defend £72m suit over UN contracts

fields.headline: Compass to defend £72m suit over UN contracts
fields.bodyText: Compass, the world's largest catering company, is being sued in the US courts as part of a $125m (£72m) action by a competitor over the awarding of United Nations contracts. Supreme Foodservice has filed the suit against a number of defendants in New York. Compass said it would "resolutely defend" the action and did not expect any material effect on financial performance. Last month it said it had found "serious irregularities" at its Eurest Support Services business in relation to UN contracts and that disciplinary action, including dismissal, had been taken against a number of individuals.
